title: The Cyborg Scientist
quote: Excited for new discoveries, Martha accepted her consciousness to be transferred in a robot to explore the red planet better
motto: The only way is forward, and I am ready to sacrifice myself to save the earth
pains: Considered not fully human, struggling sense of identity

title: The Base Manager
quote: Responsible for managing Eagle Base and enforcing laws, Otto is an independently elected official
motto: We have the unique opportunity to build a new kind of society
objectives: Ensure the base is attractive for new businesses
Good quality of life on the base
pains: Interference of political tensions from planet Earth on Mars
Corporations taking advantage of legal no-mans-land

title: The Earth Activist
quote: Concerned that the attention will shift uniquely to Mars, Maya infiltrated the Mars base to summon authorities and activate the community on-site
motto: Why are we spending these thrillions of euros for Mars? We need this money to save the Earth!
objectives: Living in harmony with the natural world
pains: Pollution on both on Mars & Earth
Lack of funds to overcome earth-related issues

title: The Mars Alien
quote: A representative of the Alien tribes of Mars, 5*7#@-  has witnessed the arrival of the first colonists and wish to resist the invasion
motto: We don’t want to become the next human colony… If they want to stay, they have to learn how to live with us
pains: Fighting in a way that is peaceful

title: The Space Migrant
quote: Stuck for years in low paying jobs on planet Earth, Selim accepted a job on Mars in the hope of giving a better future to his family
motto: I miss my family but I know that this job will pay for my kids’ education... They won’t have to do the same job as me
objectives: High salary, being able to provide for the family
pains: Struggles with the Mars way of living, culture shock

title: The Space Tourist
quote: Excited to experience the first lot of commercial leisure routes to Mars, Hui wants to expand his list of visited places
motto: After cruising across Antarctica the Atlantic, I cannot wait to experience travel on another planet!
objectives: Gaining new followers on social media
Find a side job on Mars while travelling
pains: High traveling costs wiping away all his savings

title: AI powered 'Cobots'
subtitle: Collaborative robots (‘cobots’) are AI-enabled systems and robotics, representing an integral part of the Mars One community
what: Reduce the need for humans in clean rooms
Speed up the response of satellites during natural disasters
Analyse satellite images to monitor  environmental conditions on Earth and Mars
how: Uses the power of deep learning and AI-enabled recognition
Many small cobots can assemble to carry out large tasks

title: Circadian Rhythm control
subtitle: The Lighting System to Improve Circadian Rhythm Control was designed and built to help regulate the sleep cycles of Mars One colonists
what: Induce a hibernation state during long-duration spaceflight
Prevent sleep disorders on Mars caused by the lack of a true cycle of sunlight
how: At the beginning of the workday, the intensity of the light gets brighter as time goes by
The light colour evolves throughout the day to replicate natural light

title: CRISPR Gene Editing
subtitle: CRISPRs are specialised stretches of DNA. CRISPR technology allows researchers to easily alter DNA sequences and modify gene function
what: Prevent radiation-induced genetic damage for colonists
Address global food shortages by genetically modifying crops (e.g staying fresh for longer during long-distance transport)
Allow crops to adjust and be fit to Mars atmosphere
how: Strands of DNA are cut with the protein Cas9 (or "CRISPR-associated") in order to induce new properties in a living organism

title: Mars Coin
subtitle: Marscoin is the largest cryptocurrency platform of the Mars One colony. It supports smart contracts between all kinds of parties in any type of currency
what: Enables universal trade between people, machines and the planet in a service-based economy
Allows direct trade: no need for a human intermediary to accept the transaction
how: A smart contract is a transaction protocol that automatically executes when pre-defined conditions are met
All Earth currencies and all resources available on Mars can be exchanged for Marscoins

title: Neural Implants
subtitle: Neuralink is a neural implant that all Mars One colonists have been equipped with
what: Remove language barriers by translating other languages directly in the brain
Boost memory monitor health levels on the Mars base
how: Neuralink devices consist of a tiny chip connected to the brain with 1,000 wires
The chip connects via Bluebooth to a computer or smartphone that the user can control

title: Social Credit System
subtitle: The Social Credit System is a national reputation system developed by Mars One, powered by facial recognition systems and big data analysis
what: Establish a unified record system of trustworthiness for individuals, businesses and the government
Prioritise 'good behaviour' (e.g people with high credit ratings may wait less time at hospitals, get discounts at hotels etc...)
how: The system utilizes numerical score as the reward and punishment mechanism
Negative credit: financial dishonesty, loud music and eating in public transport, violating traffic rules and not recycling
Positive credit: donating blood or to charity and volunteering for community services

title: Isolation
subtitle: Despite experiments conducted to test human reactions to isolation, Mars One colonists are suffering from the restricted environment and smaller communities, leading to rising tensions in the base
questions: How might we improve the mental health of Mars citizens so that they feel less isolated?
Which products & services can be developed to reduce anxiety from the simulated environment & isolation?

title: Inequal Social Structures
subtitle: Robots are an integral part of Mars' society, but boundaries are still blurred. Inequalities from the earth are duplicated within humans
questions: How does your product change or enable new ways to interact?
In what ways might the community itself be an asset?

title: Limited Food Resources
subtitle: Trade of goods between the earth & Mars are limited, increasing the need for  innovative food solutions that create rituals and limit waste at every stage of the chain
questions: How might your idea replace single-use products? What would be its different life cycles?
Which services around food could you envision to develop new habits or experiences?
